plots: Monica and Phoebe trick Rachel into thinking they had their bridal shower without her .
Rachel is happy without all those people at her bridal shower at first , because she wanted to spend it with only people she loved .
Rachel and Phoebe put a bridal shower to Monica but the surprise doesnt result the way Rachel and Phoebe thought about .
Monica screw the bridal shower Rachel and Phoebe had put
Rachel and Phoebe realize that in two days they have to throw Monica a bridal shower .
